name: Returning the Frogs to their Home (Uni Project)
name_original: Returning the Frogs to their Home (Uni Project)
description:
What would Frogger look like if someone set out to make it with little to no knowledge of what frogger, or even video games in general? This game was an attempt answer that question!

Inspired by the Artist Styling of Jean Dubuffet and the Art Brut concept that he created.

Developed by Brendon Jones for SAE Studio 1
